Payment_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Payment_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Intercompany_Contract_Billing_Schedule_D.description: Element containing Customer Contract Lines for Intercompany Contract Billing Schedule

validation.validation: You can't delete customer contract lines that aren't available on this billing schedule.
Use the Submit Intercompany Contract Billing Schedule web service to only add intercompany customer contract lines to the billing schedule.
validation.description: Use the Submit Intercompany Contract Billing Schedule web service to only add intercompany customer contract lines to the billing schedule.

validation.validation: Specify an intercompany customer contract currency and a billing schedule currency that match.
validation.description: Specify an intercompany customer contract currency and a billing schedule currency that match.

validation.validation: You can't create a billing schedule when a change request is in process for the contract.
validation.description: You can't create a billing schedule when a change request is in process for the contract.

validation.validation: You can't update a canceled billing schedule.
validation.description: You can't update a canceled billing schedule.

validation.validation: Specify a Billing Method of Transaction.
validation.description: Specify a Billing Method of Transaction.

validation.validation: Specify valid customer contract lines on the billing schedule for the company and customer.
validation.description: Contract Line(s) being added are not valid for Schedule.  Valid lines can be seen in the UI for the Schedule using the Maintain Contract Lines button.

validation.validation: You must add at least 1 customer contract line to submit the schedule for approval.
